original_text: Esther went to King Xerxes in his royal rooms in the palace. That happened in the tenth month of the year, called Tebeth. King Xerxes had ruled for seven years.
korean_text: 아하수에로 왕의 제칠년 시월 곧 데벳월에 에스더가 왕궁에 인도되어 들어가서 왕 앞에 나가니

sentences.original_text: in his royal rooms in the palace
That happened in the tenth month of the year
sentences.korean_translation: 그 일은 연중 열 번째 달에 일어났습니다

sentences.original_text: King Xerxes had ruled for seven years
